Can you explain how to bridge from Verus to Ethereum using Verus Mobile?
I think there's a misunderstanding! Verus Mobile does not support bridging from Verus to Ethereum. Instead, it provides instructions on how to bridge from Ethereum to Verus.

# How to bridge from Ethereum to Verus

Please read the first parts of [this article](https://medium.com/veruscoin/how-to-participate-in-the-verus-ethereum-bridge-launch-73aeeae1c76a). You can skip the part on preconverting.
